statements: SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT id, customer_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE platform_name = 'Twitter';
SELECT feedback_message, rating FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 123456;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, platform_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY feedback_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedback > 3 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT platform_name, AVG(rating) as avg_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY platform_name HAVING avg_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_message FROM feedback WHERE feedback_message ILIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT platform_name) as unique_platforms FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING unique_platforms <= 2 ORDER BY unique_platforms ASC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback WHERE platform = 'Web';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, platform, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE platform = 'Mobile' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT improvement_text, date_added FROM Improvements ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE platform = 'Website';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM Improvements WHERE date_added >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, improvement_text, date_added FROM Improvements ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT f.feedback_id, f.platform, i.improvement_text FROM Feedback f JOIN Improvements i ON f.feedback_id = i.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, platform FROM customers ORDER BY platform DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, feedback_text FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, platform FROM customers WHERE platform='Web';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customers c INNER JOIN feedback_analysis fa ON c.customer_id = fa.customer_id WHERE fa.sentiment_score > 50;
SELECT feedback_date, product_name, category FROM feedback_analysis fa INNER JOIN products p ON fa.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_feedback;
SELECT feedback, platform FROM social_media_feedback WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, rating FROM product_ratings WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_reviews WHERE customer_id = 'ad45f7b8-157d-44e1-8151-6651b82b889e';
SELECT * FROM social_media_feedback ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, platform, feedback FROM social_media_feedback WHERE platform='Twitter';
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM product_reviews GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(rating) AS rating_count FROM product_ratings GROUP BY product_id HAVING rating_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 2;
SELECT feedback_id, platform, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT service_name, department, manager_id FROM services WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, platform, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 AND platform = 'Website';
SELECT service_name, department FROM services WHERE manager_id = 10 ORDER BY department, service_name;
